citation: State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order 2008 (Tas)
text:
State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order 2008

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order under section 12(1) of the State Service Act 2000 .

12 February 2008

W. J. E. COX

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Premier

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the State Service (Agencies and Heads of Agencies) Order 2008 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on 12 February 2008.

3. Principal Act
    In this order, the State Service Act 2000 is referred to as the Principal Act.

4.
    The amendments effected by this clause have been incorporated into the authorised version of the State Service Act 2000 .

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 12 February 2008

This order is administered in the Department of Premier and Cabinet.
